name: Blocky Ragdoll Soccer - Multi Football Goal Striker & Supper Dream Team 2016 Edition
name_original: Blocky Ragdoll Soccer - Multi Football Goal Striker & Supper Dream Team 2016 Edition
description:
French EURO CHAMPIONSHIP 2016 is here!

Let the fun begin ! Blocky Ragdoll Soccer is a 3D physics based soccer game!
Jump and Kick simultaneously and score if you can!
Try it for yourself! Easy to learn... Hard to master!

**********************************
Features:
- One Player mode and Two Players mode
- One character versus one character mode
- Two character versus two character mode
- Famous clubs and a National teams skins
- Hilarious Gameplay

Have fun playing alone or with a friend with famous club players like Arsenal, Atletico Madrid, Barcelona, Bayern Munchen, Chelsea, FC Porto, Juventus, Manchester City, Manchester United, PSG and Real Madrid!
You can play with the best national teams as well like Argentina, Brasil, England, France, Germany, Italy, Netherland, Portugal, Spain, USA!
It's almost feels like you are in the EURO 2016 or in the Champions League, isn't it? :)

Try various tricks to make goals !
You only need to tap to play the game !
Figure out which country or Club team you play !

Be attention, it is a funny and addicting game, come and invite your friends to join the game ASAP!
**********************************
